bibl.title: Greek tax receipts from Abydos in the British Museum
bibl.note: Dike Tax. - Poll Tax. - Formula of the Receipts. - 1. Inv. EA 49118. Receipt for Dike Tax. 30 September, 89. - 2. Inv. EA 49119. Receipt for Dike Tax. 11 October, AD 94. - 3. Inv. EA 49122. Receipt for Dike Tax. 18 October, 106. - 4. Inv. EA 49117. Bank Receipt for Poll Tax. 23 March, AD 91. - 5. Inv. EA 49121. Receipt for Poll Tax. 5 April, AD 103. - 6. Inv. EA 49120. Receipt for Poll Tax. 1 May, AD 105.
bibl.seg: Adrienn Almásy-Martin & Ruth Duttenhöfer, Greek Tax Receipts from Abydos in the British Museum.
